info.task: navigate out of start of radio group
info.title: Navigate out of the start of a radio group in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusOnFirstRadioButton
setupScript.description: sets focus on the first radio button

user: With the reading cursor on the 'Regular crust' radio button, navigate out of the radio group. Note: You may need to press certain commands (such as Up Arrow) multiple times to hear all information relating to the group.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the 'Regular crust' radio button, navigate out of the radio group. Note: You may need to press certain commands (such as Up Arrow) multiple times to hear all information relating to the group.
instructions.mode: Verify the Virtual Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn on the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: Name of the group, 'Pizza Crust', is conveyed
name 'Navigate forwards from here' is conveyed
